remarks: Transitive law deduction for 'less than', 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by NM, 9-Jan-2006.)
statement:
ltd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
letrd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
ltletrd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
ltletrd.5 $e |- ( ph -> B <_ C ) $.
ltletrd $p |- ( ph -> A < C ) $.
